1148310.name: Behind the Beyond
1148310.description:
Once Upon a Time… in a Hand-Stitched Realm

Jánoska, the brave (and slightly naive) youngest son, leaves home seeking honest work—but instead tumbles into a world filled with magic and mischief.

Wander through enchanted forests and sun-kissed hills that feel like living embroidery. Meet hermits, merchants, and the occasional cunning scoundrel, all painted with folk-art charm.

The Enchanted Realm of Behind the Beyond

Your journey begins in a small village, but the path quickly leads you into the extraordinary: deep enchanted woods, the Sky-Tall Tree that bridges worlds, and even the King’s glittering palace—populated by royals, rogues, and everyone in between.

Magic, Choices & a Clever Fox Companion

Click your way through the story—look, talk, pick stuff up, charm, flex muscle, or slip past danger. Many puzzles offer more than one solution, changing not just outcomes but which paths you unlock further into the game.

You will also meet a faithful companion, the Fox—sharp-eyed, magically gifted, and far more than a sidekick. Switch to her when stealth, spells, or cunning are key.

Time Waits for No One

As time ticks, the day-night cycle influences what paths open, when secrets emerge, and how the world unfolds.

Always Time for a Round of Cards

Need to win respect or just settle an argument fairly? Challenge locals (even animals!) to Ulti, the clever, competitive Hungarian card game. Every tavern plays it, and—with our tutorial included—soon you will too.

And yes—the same version lives on Steam separately, with added leaderboards and multiplayer fun! Check it out!

Tales Shared… by You

Planning to stream? Flip on Streamer Mode. Your viewers will see a password with which they can connect to your game via our companion site and vote on what you should do in your game. The most popular choice will be indicated to you in your game — no chat chaos, no setup drama, it's all integrated.

Why You’ll Stay for the Long Haul

Behind the Beyond combines folk-tale artistry and branching storytelling with clever puzzles, time-based world dynamics, and a fox you’d want at your side. It’s more than an adventure—it’s a folktale that’s yours to shape with every choice you make.

Key Features

  • Based on Hungarian folktales

  • 2 controllable characters

  • RPG-like skill-based interactions

  • Multiple puzzle solutions

  • Day-night cycle that affects gameplay

  • Built-in streamer mode

  • Ulti card game included
1148310.supported_languages:
英语*, 匈牙利语*, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语
*具有完全音频支持的语言
